Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the invertebrate defensin family (Type 2 subfamily)
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Antibacterial activity against Gram-positive and Gram-negative bacteria.

Literature.Title: Identification of a defensin from the hemolymph of the American dog tick, Dermacentor variabilis.
Literature.Author: Johns R, Sonenshine D.E, Hynes W.L.

Literature.Title: An arthropod defensin expressed by the hemocytes of the American dog tick, Dermacentor variabilis (Acari Ixodidae).
Literature.Author: Ceraul SM, Sonenshine DE, Ratzlaff RE, Hynes WL.

Literature.Title: An arthropod defensin expressed by the hemocytes of the American dog tick, Dermacentor variabilis (Acari: Ixodidae).
Literature.Author: Hynes W.L.,Ratzlaff R.E.,Sonenshine D.E.,Ceraul S.M.
